DOC.brief_summary: Previous studies have reported that about 3 % of patients who have had open inguinal herniorrhaphy had a visceral, ejaculatory-related pain. The investigators want to assess this problem among patients after laparoscopic inguinal hernia repair with(self-administered questionnaire study).
DOC.brief_title: Pain Related Sexual Dysfunction After Laparoscopic Inguinal Hernia Repair
